metatags.og:description: Company Description: Our Global Data & Analytics team is the hub of harvesting and analyzing data to drive strategic, customer-centric business decisions for our brands. By collaborating with partners across a broad variety of business functions, associates on our D&A team provide recommendations that allow our teams to push boundaries and stay at the forefront of retail trends.The Senior Data Scientist on our A&F Data Science team within Data & Analytics will develop solutions for complex, ambiguous, and high-visibility business challenges ranging from personalization, marketing mix modeling, demand forecasting to supply chain optimization with a focus on building machine learning products. This role will closely partner with our Marketing/Real Estate/Digital Product teams to help support their modeling, advanced analytics, and segmentation needs. metatags.og:description: Company Description: Position is open to Remote candidates in the US or Canada. Must be able to work starting around 9am EST to connect with teammates in Oslo, Norway.Founded in 2010, Tapad cracked the code on cross-device marketing technology. Our groundbreaking, proprietary technology assimilates trillions of data points to find the relationship between smartphones, desktops, laptops, tablets, and connected TVs. Ten years later, we are processing data at petabyte scale, with an engineering team that comprises roughly half of our entire organization. When you work with us, you matter, and your work matters.We use Scala, in combination with large-scale data processing and open-source technologies, to build our device graph.  Across our engineering teams, we also use Scala, GCP, Spark, Kubernetes, Python, TypeScript, Angular, and anything else that helps us get the job done.  We're open-minded about new technologies, we're passionate about what we do, and we make time for everyone to learn and g

metatags.og:description: Company Description: Job Description  The A&F Corporate Global Data and Integrations DevOps team is searching for an ambitious and gritty Machine Learning Engineer.  This person will focus on implementing best-in-class Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) tools and processes for data scientists to leverage in order to enhance reproducibility and resilience of insight products.  We are committed to scaling predictive analytics across the organization and MLOps is critical to enabling development cycles for new insight products that don’t get mired by past, high-maintenance projects.  MLOps practices will also allow us to systematize best-in-class open source algorithms for delivering value to both internal and external customers.  The ML Engineer will demonstrate a deep comprehensive working knowledge of every component of MLOps as well as fundamental Data Engineering practices that will enable them to train other team members to become full-stack, end-to-end data scientists – owning a project from da

metatags.og:title: Lead Data Scientist - (Job Location: Chicago, IL) – (Job ID #REF23306D)
metatags.og:description:
Job Description: Leads the design of new products for the NielsenIQ portfolio. Engages in client and Product Manager conversations to understand needs. Connects needs to current products, algorithms, and data flows. Obtains data and conducts experiments to design new algorithms and data models to solve client needs. Leads, supervises, and supports other data scientists in the team working toward the same goal. Domestic and/or international travel for visits to other NielsenIQ office sites up to 5% of the year.

Qualifications: Position requires a Bachelor's degree or a foreign equivalent in Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering or related, and 5 years of work experience in any mathematics, statistics, or engineering position.Or Master’s degree or a foreign equivalent in Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering or related, and 3 years of work experience in any mathematics, statistics, or engineering position.

Company Description: It all started with an idea at Block in 2013. Initially built to take the pain out of peer-to-peer payments, Cash App has gone from a simple product with a single purpose to a dynamic ecosystem, developing unique financial products, including Afterpay, to provide a better way to send, spend, invest, borrow and save to our 47 million monthly active customers. We want to redefine the world’s relationship with money to make it more relatable, instantly available, and universally accessible. This is our mission, and it’s why working at Cash App means so much more than a job.

Today, Cash App has thousands of employees working globally across office and remote locations, with a culture geared toward innovation, collaboration and impact. We’ve been a distributed team since day one, and many of our roles can be done remotely from the countries where Cash App operates. No matter the location, we tailor our experience to ensure our employees are creative, productive, and happy.

Company Description: Shopify is the world's first 'retail operating system'. It has evolved over 16 years of making commerce better for everyone. From building a new product feature on our commerce platform, to helping a merchant troubleshoot an issue over the phone, the mission has always been about empowering merchants through our work. Leveraging our data has always been essential to this mission. Products like App Recommendations, Capital, Marketing Recommendations, and Shopify Markets are all powered by data products and algorithms that benefit merchants, not just through their data, but through the entire history of commerce on Shopify.  Shopify is now permanently remote, and we’re working towards a future that is digital by design. That location you see above? Consider it merely an example of hundreds of potential locations across the Americas where Shopify is hiring. metatags.og:description: Company Description: Miller Electric Mfg LLC (an ITW Welding Company) was founded on a simple idea to a very real problem: create the best welding technology in the world, while providing state of the art products at an affordable price. During its inception in 1929 and at the height of the great depression, founder Niels Miller set out to create a product for the everyday person – farmers, blacksmiths, automotive professionals, and the like. He succeeded, and the Miller Electric Mfg LLC family was born. With a global footprint, thousands of patents, and universal brand recognition in the market for the over nine decades, Miller is more than just an industry leading OEM, it’s a family. A family that collaborates, solves integrated problems, innovates, and takes risks, together. Our success is a result of our employees and our community, one we’re deeply proud of. metatags.og:description:
Job Description: In this role, you will lead and contribute to new and ongoing research and development efforts that advance Epsilon's identity match abilities – leveraging data science, machine learning and other disciplines to create new data-driven capabilities for our real-time digital marketing business.We prioritize analytical thinking, creativity and computer science skills over ad tech industry experience.  If using internet-scale data to drive business impact excites you, and you enjoy the kind of research that starts with a blank sheet of paper that turns ideas into a new technological reality, we want to talk to you.Responsibilities* Lead and individually contribute to data science and machine learning R&D projects
* Use your expertise in data science, machine learning, and computer science to lead research projects and recommend solutions to technology and business problems
* Interview candidates for open positions on our team
* Lead and contribute to projects from early-stage research
